reviewText:
WW !! Buffs would enjoy this with  actual footage from Sea and Land.  The courage of Marines above & beyond the call of duty.
Excellent Documentation
My son in law is a militariaphile, I combined this with Flags Of Our Fathers and Letters From Iwo Jima to give him three different perspectives on the same battle.

Watching all 3 of the included programs really gave me insight into a battle I'd heard of, but didn't know much about.

I thought it was interesting to learn that Iwo Jima's strategic significance was, that by capturing it, the American's could bomb Japan without refueling.

I recommend this DVD to any history buff.
This DVD has 3 programs which are all interesting and informative. I really thought the program with the color footage was amazing!
